Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dennis Eckersley (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/29/1985, off Bob Welch (LAD)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1989, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $428,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Philadelphia on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: 1B Ricky Jordan. Going to PHI: RF Joe Orsulak)...
9/2/1990: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $1,540,000 per year, for 4 years.
